translations: 咒文，符咒；祈祷文；[机]链斗式升降机

sentences.sentence: Little white Paternoster, which God made, which God said, which God placed in paradise.
sentences.translation: 小小的白色主祷文，天主所创，天主所说，天主曾贴在天堂上。

sentences.sentence: Above the door of the refectory this prayer, which was called the white Paternoster, and which possessed the property of bearing people straight to paradise, was inscribed in large black letters.
sentences.translation: 在食堂门的上面，有一篇用大黑字写的祈祷文，叫做《白色主祷文》，据说有指引正直的人进入天堂的法力。
